author: Mina Chong
title: Sierpinski triangle
question:
Hi, in the code for fractals-starter there is the following signature:
(@htdf stri)
(@signature Number -> Image)
;; produce a Sierpinski Triangle of the given size
Shouldn't Number be Natural in this case? I thought that triangle can only take positive numbers as an argument for side length. Thanks!
instructor_answer: In this problem you are designing a function to produce a Sierpinski triangle.  You aren't duplicating the signature for the triangle primitive.
